text: Taliaʻuli Liavaʻa, (born c. 1970) is a Tongan former rugby union player who played as fly-half. ==Career== He played for Toloa Old Boys at club level. He also was in the Tonga 1987 Rugby World Cup squad, where he was the youngest member at the age of 17.Invito allo spettacolo con i mostri del rugby larepubblica.it However, Liava'a did not played any match in the tournament. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Tongan rugby union players Category:Rugby union fly-halves
title: Taliaʻuli Liavaʻa
